packsmith.TEXT: You should get more rust from that wheel now.

candle.TEXT: I've increased the strength  of the light.
The warm glow should make shrooms grow twice as fast.
Which makes no sense since they like dim lighting.

ascension.TEXT: I don't think I know enough to touch this.
It seems to be sucking in momentum at an increased rate.
I barely touched it I swear.

emptiness.TEXT: I'm not entirely sure what you want me to do with this.
You're going to wear that? Really?.
It uh, looks good on you I think?

ritual.TEXT: This one's easy, I can just replace one of these candles with one of mine.
Now the first candle you Light is free.
I'm not giving you any more.

hell.TEXT: There's a powerful contract etched into this sigil.
I can start this contract for you, but be warned.
This thing is tough, even starting it requires everything you've gotten up till now.
It will invert the effect of your current emotion turning it into a debuff.
What exactly that is... Eh, you'll find out.
This will persist until you regain this sigil and augment it again.
The contract will begin once you are born again.
If you don't want to do this yet, just augment something else before a reset.

hellcomplete.TEXT: There's a powerful contract etched into this sigil.
I can start this contract for you, but...
You've already finished it somehow. Huh.
Well good for you, you've been updated.
Go ahead and try entering hell now.

hellalt.TEXT: I can draw out the power of the blue babies and make you immortal!!
It's not implemented yet so I don't have to explain nuthin.

sanddollar.TEXT: Perhaps if you stacked more neatly they'll give each other powers.
Sounds like a bit of a stretch, but let me send some roots down to help you.
Now you're getting more rotations per sond dollar owned. What a neat looking tower.

zundanight.TEXT: I, once again, do not know what to do with this.
I don't think the developer knows either. You better ask her instead.

undercity.TEXT: I can't do anything with this.

twins.TEXT: I don't want to touch this. It's spiky.
